snippet.title: Skies of Arcadia - Sega Dreamcast - Intro & First hour of Gameplay [HD 1080p]
snippet.description:
The finest RPG on the Dreamcast and one of the top ten RPGs ever made, Skies of Arcadia follows the adventure of Sky Pirates Vyse, Aika two of the Blue Rogues. Who after rescuing a women known as Fina find themselves on an adventure of a lifetime. 

Skies of Arcadia does everything  just right, well apart from having one too many random battles. A huge game with both land and ship combat, packed with extras and will takes months to finish. Add to that great characters and a highly gripping story and it just doesn't put a foot wrong. The later Gamecube release did include some extra content, but the soundtrack took a quality knock and that version doesn't support VGA. The game and much of its visual design is clearly heavily inspired by the  Studio Ghibli and Hayao Miyazaki film Laputa: Castle in the Sky.

Also known as: Eternal Arcadia / エターナルアルカディア (Japan)

Release: 2000
Developer: Overworks
Publisher: Sega
Format: Sega Dreamcast (DC) / ドリームキャスト 

Skies of Arcadia was also released on the Nintendo Gamecube in 2003, but has since then not been ported to any other format.

Like this then checkout the Randomised Gaming blog:
http://randomisedgaming.tumblr.com 

All footage in this video is captured directly from the Sega Dreamcast console, via an Elgato Game Capture HD using a VGA to HDMI converter. All footage in this video is captured directly from the Sega Dreamcast console, via an Elgato Game Capture HD using a VGA to HDMI converter. Note this video is captured from the US NTSC version of the game as the European release only support 50hz and doesn't work with VGA.
